CustomField.description: Displays SOQL query for failed test audit
CustomField.formula: IF(Method_Pass__c == false, "[SELECT Id, Action, CreatedBy.Name, CreatedDate, Display, Section FROM SetupAuditTrail WHERE CreatedDate > " & TEXT(Last_Success__c) & " AND CreatedDate < " & TEXT(First_Failure__c) & "]", "Method Passed" )
CustomField.label: Failure Audit
